meanings.definition: One of eight equal parts of a whole.
meanings.sent1: The pizza was divided into eighths for everyone to have a fair share.
meanings.sent2: She cut the cake into eighths to serve all the guests.
meanings.sent3: The eighths of the pie were so tiny, they looked like little crumbs.
meanings.sent4: In the game, each player represented an eighth of the kingdom, vying for control.
meanings.sent5: The eighths of the rainbow shone brightly in the sky after the rainstorm.

meanings.definition: The fraction equal to one divided by eight.
meanings.sent1: He had to solve a math problem involving eighths in class.
meanings.sent2: The recipe called for three eighths of a cup of sugar.
meanings.sent3: The baker mistakenly added seven eighths instead of one, making the cake too sweet.
meanings.sent4: Her savings were only an eighth of what she needed for the trip.
meanings.sent5: The eighths of the pie chart represented different expenses in the budget.

meanings.definition: The ordinal number corresponding to the number eight in a series.
meanings.sent1: She came in eighth place in the race, just missing the medal.
meanings.sent2: The book on the shelf was the eighth in the series.
meanings.sent3: The eighth in line for the throne was a distant cousin no one had heard of.
meanings.sent4: The eighth day of the week always felt like a fresh start.
meanings.sent5: The eighth note in the melody added a cheerful tune to the song.
